      • clickByTextOffset

        public static void clickByTextOffset(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver,
                                     java.lang.String label,
                                     PerfectoUtils.LabelPosition labelPosition,
                                     java.lang.String offset)
        ***************************************************************************
        Parameters:
        driver: - RemoteWebDriver from test
        label: - Label to find on screen
        labelPosition: - Direction of click location relative to label.
        • Uses Enum LabelPosition: Above;Below;Left;Right
        offset: - Value of the offset in pixels or percentage.
        • Percentage is noted by the use of a trailing % character
        ****************************************************************************

      • clickVisualText

        public static void clickVisualText(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver,
                                   java.lang.String label,
                                   java.lang.Boolean scroll,
                                   PerfectoUtils.ScrollNext next,
                                   int maxScroll,
                                   int index,
                                   int threshold,
                                   PerfectoUtils.MatchMode matchMode,
                                   int dpi)
        ***************************************************************************
        Parameters:
        driver: - RemoteWebDriver from test
        label: - Label to find on screen
        scroll: - Scroll if true (default is false)
        next: - Direction of scroll (default is SWIPE_UP). Uses Enum ScrollNext: SWIPE_UP,SWIPE_DOWN,SWIPE_RIGHT,SWIPE_LEFT,UP,DOWN,RIGHT,LEFT
        maxScroll: - Maximum number of times to scroll (default is 5).
        • Possible values 0 - 100
        index: - Number of index if multiples found.
        • Possible values 1 - 2147483647
        threshold: - Minimum accuracy.
        • Possible Values 1 - 100
        matchMode: - How to process match ( default is contain).
        • Uses Enum MatchMode: contain, equal, startwith, endwith, first, last, index
        dpi: - Specifies the dots per inch resolution (default is 96).
        • Possible values 1 - 2147483647
        • Please try first the value 160, if the direction is correct then find the best value around this value [120-200].If not, then try the lower range: [50-120];
        ****************************************************************************

      • findVisualTextElement

        public static java.lang.Boolean findVisualTextElement(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver,
                                                      java.lang.String label,
                                                      java.lang.Boolean scroll,
                                                      PerfectoUtils.ScrollNext next,
                                                      int maxScroll,
                                                      int index,
                                                      int threshold,
                                                      PerfectoUtils.MatchMode matchMode,
                                                      int dpi)
        ***************************************************************************
        Parameters:
        driver: - RemoteWebDriver from test
        label: - Label to find on screen
        scroll: - Scroll if true (default is false)
        next: - Direction of scroll (default is SWIPE_UP).
        • Uses Enum ScrollNext: SWIPE_UP,SWIPE_DOWN,SWIPE_RIGHT,SWIPE_LEFT,UP,DOWN,RIGHT,LEFT
        maxScroll: - Maximum number of times to scroll (default is 5).
        • Possible values 0 - 100
        index: - Number of index if multiples found.
        • Possible values 1 - 2147483647
        threshold: - Minimum accuracy.
        • Possible Values 1 - 100
        matchMode: - How to process match (default is contain).
        • Uses Enum MatchMode: contain,equal,startwith,endwith,first,last,index
        dpi: - Specifies the dots per inch resolution (default is 96).
        • Possible values 1 - 2147483647
        • Please try first the value 160, if the direction is correct then find the best value around this value [120-200].If not, then try the lower range: [50-120];
        Returns:
        boolean true if found ****************************************************************************

      • findVisualImageElement

        public static java.lang.Boolean findVisualImageElement(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver,
                                                       java.lang.String filePath)
        ***************************************************************************
        Parameters:
        driver: - RemoteWebDriver from test
        filePath: - Path to image file : or PRIVATE:images\\image.png
        • Uses Perfecto media repository if starts with PRIVATE: or PUBLIC: Example-- PRIVATE:images/image.png
        • Uploads file to media repository images folder if it's a local file path.
        • Must use double backslash when referencing local path-- ie. C:\\temp\\image.png
        Returns:
        boolean true if found ****************************************************************************

      • findVisualImageElement

        public static java.lang.Boolean findVisualImageElement(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver,
                                                       java.lang.String filePath,
                                                       int bound,
                                                       int threshold)
        ***************************************************************************
        Parameters:
        driver: - RemoteWebDriver from test
        filePath: - Local or Perfecto Cloud repository path to image file
        • Uses Perfecto media repository if starts with PRIVATE: or PUBLIC: Example-- PRIVATE:images/image.png
        • Uploads file to media repository images folder if it's a local file path.
        • Must use double backslash when referencing local path-- ie. C:\\temp\\image.png
        bound - The ratio in percentage by which the original needle width may vary.
        • The ratio is defined as a ( 100 - specified percentage ) / 100
        threshold - Specifies the percentage of acceptable match level. Possible values 20 - 100
        • Default is calculated by the system according to the needle.
        • Too low values might lead to FALSE POSITIVE results while too high values might lead to FALSE NEGATIVE results.
        Returns:
        boolean true if found
        ****************************************************************************
